name: alexa-for-lg-webos-tv
description: An Alexa skill and a bridge for adding Alexa support to LG WebOS TVs that don't have native Alexa Support
author: Paul E. Bender <pebender@gmail.com> (http://www.backinthirty.net)

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && (cd pkg/skill && npm run clean) && (cd pkg/bridge && npm run clean)
scripts.install_modules: npm install && (cd pkg/skill && npm install) && (cd pkg/bridge && npm install)
scripts.build: (cd pkg/skill && npm run build) && (cd pkg/bridge && npm run build)
scripts.pack: (cd pkg/skill && npm run pack) && (cd pkg/bridge && npm run pack)
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run install_modules && npm run build && npm run pack
